attributes.name: Hilton Credit
attributes.conditions: Must enroll in benefit and have Hilton for Business account. Credits apply quarterly ($50 max per quarter). Must purchase directly with Hilton properties or hilton.com.
details: Hilton for Business members can get statement credits of up to $50 quarterly on eligible purchases made directly with Hilton. Enrollment required. If you do not already have a Hilton for Business account, you will be registered for one at the time you enroll in the benefit.â€¡
attributes.title: Hilton Credit
